short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JEMPass Extension provides quick access to your JEMPass Keychain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Password Pain Killer - World’s first and only passwordless Password Manager


JEMPass is a modern and innovative Password Manager that makes password headaches a thing of the past. It is the world’s first and only passwordless Password Manager. 

Unlike traditional Password Managers, which rely on a Master Password to secure your data and account, JEMPass uses JEM AirKeys to keep your data private and secure. There’s no Master Password in the JEMPass system. With JEMPass, there’s nothing to remember (or forget)! 

JEM AirKey HD (hardware device - buy one here) is required to create a JEMPass account. 


FEATURES AND BENEFITS

Save all your passwords and login credentials in the JEMPass Keychain 
Access JEMPass Keychain from any device — and sign in to apps and websites with ease 
Use JEM AirKey to verify your identity when required  — no need to remember or type in a Master Password — ever
Up-to-date end-to-end encryption to ensure your data stays private an secure — your JEM AirKey is always required to unlock your data


JEM AirKeys

JEMPass works with two kinds of JEM AirKeys.

JEM AirKey HD (hardware device, “JEM”,  “JEM HD”, “JEM Device”) is a patented personal identity verifier and security key with an integrated biometric (fingerprint) sensor. You must have a JEM AirKey (hardware device) to sign up for JEMPass. 

JEM AirKey SD (“softJEM”, “JEM SD”) is a software component of the JEMPass app that can be installed on Apple devices (iPhones, iPads and Macs) with TouchID or FaceID.
